title: D&D 5e Encounter Positioning Schema
description: Pure positioning data for D&D 5e encounters - agnostic to specific characters. Instruction: generate the spawn location of player and npc characters, assume a positive x,y axist grid, place them where it might make sense, avoid clusteting all characters on the same border.

spawn_points.description: Spawn point definitions for encounter participants

player_spawns.description: Spawn points for player characters (agnostic to specific characters)

spawn_id.description: Unique identifier for this spawn point

x.description: Starting X coordinate on the battlefield grid (0-99)

y.description: Starting Y coordinate on the battlefield grid (0-99)

description.description: Optional description of this spawn point

npc_spawns.description: Spawn points for NPCs with their role information

npc_name.description: Name of the NPC (for reference to npcs.json)

x.description: Starting X coordinate on the battlefield grid (0-99)

y.description: Starting Y coordinate on the battlefield grid (0-99)

is_enemy.description: Whether this NPC is an enemy

spawn_description.description: Optional description of this spawn point

terrain_features.description: Optional terrain features that affect positioning
